modelcontextprotocol/java-sdk

Java SDK for connecting AI models to tools and data using Model Context Protocol

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • TypeScript SDK for building Model Context Protocol clients and servers
  • Python SDK for connecting LLMs to tools and data using the Model Context Protocol
  • Spec and docs for Model Context Protocol
  • central hub for managing AI tools, prompts, and resources with Model Context Protocol
  • collection of example servers for Model Context Protocol,connecting LLMs to APIs and data sources
  • catalog of Microsoft Model Context Protocol servers for AI apps
  • SDK for building interactive web UIs over Model Context Protocol
  • Python library for building interoperable AI agents using Google’s A2A protocol with Model Context Protocol support
  • Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that connects AI apps to AWS data and tools for cloud development and automation
  • Gateway for AI model APIs
